column2: I hate to spoil all the fun you're having." Vance tried to look at Moreau
column3: but he could barely see through the swelling of his puffy eyelids. "But I've got some unsettling news. You and the rest of Ramirez's hoods are about to be in a deep situation here. The minute you try to send that bomb up
column4: you can tip your hat and kiss your ass good-bye. Better enjoy this while you can."

column1:
0451|nine minutes to five a.m.|Earlier? It's nine minutes to five a.m. - who would be up this early?
